settings.rewards_subtitle: Join nomz rewards and get rewarded! You'll get 25 points just for signing up. What are you waiting for?
settings.works_text_1: Follow the instructions below to create your account for Nomz Rewards. It’s easy and free, and then you’ll be ready to start earning points.
settings.works_text_2: Once you create your account, start completing the items below to begin earning points for referring friends, following us on social media, and more!
settings.works_text_3: Once you have enough points to redeem a reward, check out the Rewards section to get codes to apply to your next order. Enter the codes at checkout.
settings.join_text_1: Click on the 'rewards' icon in the bottom left corner of your screen
settings.join_text_2: Enter your email address and click 'sign in"
settings.join_text_3: You will receive an email with a link that takes you back to nomz and signs you in
settings.refer_subtitle: Love nomz? Refer a friend and you both earn a $6 off coupon!
settings.redeem_text: Use your points at checkout and recieve $1 off for every 100 points
